Package com.nitay.couponproject.dal

Class CompaniesDBDAO

java.lang.Object
com.nitay.couponproject.dal.CompaniesDBDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompaniesDAO
public class CompaniesDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompaniesDAO
A singleton data access object, Implements CompaniesDAO interface to make CRUD operations on a SQL database. CompaniesDBDAO is connected to the ConnectionPool and used in the facades.
See Also:
CompaniesDAO, ConnectionPool, ClientFacade
